workflows.name: Team Router Agent
workflows.description: Intelligently assigns errors to appropriate teams based on stack trace
workflows.outcome: PR or issue

workflows.name: Error Regression Guard
workflows.description: Runs on every deployment to compare new errors against historical baselines. Blocks or warns on merges that reintroduce previously fixed issues. Creates 'regression detected' issues with links to original fixes.
workflows.outcome: Issue with regression report and links to prior fixes

workflows.name: Error Trend Detective
workflows.description: Monitors error frequency and patterns over time (hourly, daily, weekly). Identifies emerging issues, seasonal spikes, or degrading stability. Creates proactive alerts with trend visualizations and predicted impact.
workflows.outcome: Issue with trend report, risk assessment, and recommended next steps

workflows.name: Release Impact Analyzer
workflows.description: Automatically analyzes errors introduced in new deployments by comparing error patterns before and after releases. Creates annotated GitHub issues with regression analysis, affected user counts, and rollback recommendations.
workflows.outcome: Issue with regression analysis, affected users, and rollback recommendation

workflows.name: Flaky Error Investigator
workflows.description: Identifies intermittent errors that are hard to reproduce. Analyzes environmental factors (time of day, user agent, geographic location) and creates issues with reproduction strategies and environment setup instructions.
workflows.outcome: Issue with reproduction steps, env matrix, and next best fix attempt

workflows.name: Error Documentation Generator
workflows.description: Creates internal knowledge base articles from frequently occurring errors. Documents common causes, solutions, and prevention strategies. Links from GitHub issues to docs for faster future resolution.
workflows.outcome: Internal doc page link and cross-references added to related GitHub issues

workflows.name: Dependency Error Tracker
workflows.description: Detects errors originating from third-party dependencies or APIs. Creates issues that include dependency version info, checks for known issues in upstream repos, and suggests version upgrades or workarounds.

triggerDetails.cron: Daily scan of all dependency-related errors

workflows.outcome: Issue with upstream links, version recommendation, and mitigation plan

workflows.name: Test Coverage Suggester
workflows.description: For resolved errors, analyzes if adequate test coverage exists to prevent recurrence. Creates follow-up PRs with unit/integration tests based on the error's root cause and affected code paths.

triggerDetails.webhook: PR merged that fixes a Sentry issue
triggerDetails.cron: Weekly analysis of resolved errors without tests

workflows.outcome: PR adding tests or issue with test plan when code changes are non-trivial

workflows.name: Dependency Freshness Validator
workflows.description: Automatically runs Snyk Open Source when dependencies are added or updated. Validates the lowest-risk upgrade path, checks for known vulnerabilities in new packages, and suggests safer alternatives before allowing the change.
workflows.triggerDetails: GitHub webhook (snyk open prs marked [Snyk] in the title)
workflows.outcome: Comment on PR with risk assessment and suggested upgrade path

workflows.name: IaC Compliance Checker
workflows.description: Scans infrastructure-as-code changes for compliance violations and security misconfigurations before applying. Reports high/critical misconfigs with exact files/lines and provides compliant code changes.
workflows.outcome: PR with compliant changes or comment with exact fixes

workflows.name: Daily Security Sweep
workflows.description: Comprehensive security scan covering code vulnerabilities, dependency issues, IaC misconfigurations, and container security. Generates markdown security report summarizing total vulnerabilities by severity and recommended next steps.
workflows.outcome: Issue with consolidated security report and owners for follow-ups

workflows.name: Dependency Freshness Monitor
workflows.description: Scans all project dependencies for outdated packages with known vulnerabilities. Creates prioritized upgrade plan balancing security risk against breaking change potential. Generates PRs for low-risk updates.
workflows.outcome: Issue

workflows.name: Security Debt Tracker
workflows.description: Analyzes accumulated security vulnerabilities over time. Identifies aging issues that haven't been addressed, calculates security debt metrics, and creates prioritized remediation roadmap issues with effort estimates.
workflows.outcome: Issue that links all issues

workflows.name: Container Base Image Auditor
workflows.description: Audits all container base images for newer, more secure versions. Compares vulnerability counts across different base image tags, recommends safer alternatives, and creates PRs to update Dockerfiles with security improvements.
workflows.outcome: Issue

workflows.name: License Compliance Reporter
workflows.description: Scans project dependencies for license compliance issues. Generates report of all licenses in use, flags problematic licenses, identifies GPL contamination risks, and suggests license-safe alternatives for flagged packages.
workflows.outcome: Issue

workflows.name: Vulnerability Remediation Tracker
workflows.description: Tracks fixable security vulnerabilities and automatically creates PRs with minimal-risk fixes. Validates fixes by re-running Snyk scan, generates before/after security reports, and includes Snyk Learn lessons for education.

triggerDetails.cron: Weekly scan for all fixable issues

workflows.outcome: Queued Task to PR

workflows.name: Security Posture Dashboard
workflows.description: Maintains real-time security dashboard tracking vulnerability trends, severity distributions, MTTR (mean time to remediation), and security coverage across code/dependencies/IaC/containers. Generates executive summaries.
workflows.outcome: Queued Task to PR
workflows.metrics: Vulnerability trends, severity distributions, MTTR, security coverage

workflows.name: PR Context Enricher
workflows.description: Automatically analyzes new PRs to add context labels, detect affected areas, estimate review complexity, and suggest appropriate reviewers based on code ownership and expertise.
workflows.outcome: Comments on PR with impact summary and testing recommendations

workflows.name: Issue Specification Validator
workflows.description: Reviews new issues for completeness (reproduction steps, expected vs actual behavior, environment details). Comments with checklist of missing information and suggests issue template improvements.
workflows.outcome: Auto-labels as 'needs-more-info' if critical details are missing

workflows.name: PR Conflict Resolver
workflows.description: Analyzes requested changes and merge conflicts. Creates follow-up commits addressing review feedback, attempts auto-resolution of simple conflicts, and comments with explanation of changes made or why manual intervention is needed.
workflows.outcome: Creates follow-up commits or comments with explanation

workflows.name: Hot Path PR Validator
workflows.description: Identifies PRs modifying high-traffic or critical code paths. Runs extra validation checks, requires additional approvers, and creates detailed performance impact analysis. Blocks merge if risk thresholds exceeded.
workflows.triggerDetails: GitHub webhook (PR opened touching critical files)
workflows.outcome: Comment

workflows.name: Issue Triage Orchestrator
workflows.description: Reviews all untriaged issues, applies labels based on content analysis (bug/feature/docs), estimates priority/severity, detects duplicates, and assigns to appropriate team.
workflows.outcome: Creates weekly triage issue with trending issue types

workflows.name: Stale PR Revalidator
workflows.description: Identifies PRs inactive for >14 days, re-runs CI checks against current main, comments on conflicts or failures, pings author/reviewers, and suggests closing PRs abandoned for >60 days. Maintains 'stale PR' dashboard.
workflows.outcome: Comment and/or Label

workflows.name: Documentation Drift Detector
workflows.description: Compares code changes against documentation to detect outdated docs. Identifies API changes not reflected in docs, finds broken code examples, and creates issues linking to specific doc sections needing updates with suggested changes.
workflows.outcome: Issue

workflows.name: First-Time Contributor Welcomer
workflows.description: Identifies first-time contributors' PRs/issues, adds welcoming comments with contribution guide links, suggests similar issues for future contributions, and notifies maintainers to prioritize review.
workflows.outcome: Comment

workflows.name: Complex Merge Conflict Resolver
workflows.description: Analyzes complex merge conflicts, proposes resolution strategies with conflict visualization, creates draft commits for review. Requires human approval before pushing conflict resolution.
workflows.outcome: Comment and/or Label
